name: Champaign
description: For easily and flexibly creating petitions, fundraisers, and more.

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:schema:load && bundle exec rake db:seed

DEFAULT_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Set the login email for the default admin user

DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Set the password for the default admin user

CHAMPAIGN_PAGE_HOST.description: The domain that users will access your website through. If you're not sure, just use the app name you entered above, plus .herokuapp.com

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The secret access key for your S3 bucket user. Get from https://console.aws.amazon.com/iam/home#users

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret access key for your S3 bucket user. Get from https://console.aws.amazon.com/iam/home#users

S3_ASSET_BUCKET.description: The name of your Amazon S3 bucket

AWS_REGION.description: The region for your Amazon S3 bucket

S3_HOST_NAME.description: The S3 host. If you don't know, leave it as s3.amazonaws.com

S3_WITHOUT_ALIAS.description: VALUES BELOW THIS ONE NEED NOT BE MODIFIED. Leave this as 'true'

EXTERNAL_ASSET_PATHS.description: Where to find your oranization's assets in the repo

EXTERNAL_CSS_PATH.description: Where to load the root stylesheet for your org's assets

EXTERNAL_JS_PATH.description: Where to load the root script file for your org's assets, relative to ./app/javascript/packs/

EXTERNAL_TRANSLATION_PATH.description: Where to load your org's extra trnaslations

EXTERNAL_LIQUID_PATH.description: The directory with your org's liquid templates

LOG_TO_STDOUT.description: To make logs readable on Heroku
